briefdescription.para: Direct copies are forbidden. Use clone() instead.
Create a deep copy of this renderer.

detaileddescription.para: Should be implemented by all subclasses and generate a proper subclass.

briefdescription.para: Returns the color ramp used for shading the heatmap.
Returns debug information about this renderer.
Returns the maximum value used for shading the heatmap.

simplesect.para: maximum value for heatmap shading. If 0, then maximum value will be automatically calculated.

briefdescription.para: Allows for a renderer to modify the extent of a feature request prior to rendering.

parameterdescription.para: reference to request's filter extent. Modify extent to change the extent of feature request

briefdescription.para: Direct copies are forbidden. Use clone() instead.
Returns the radius for the heatmap.
Returns the map unit scale used for the heatmap's radius.

simplesect.para: map unit scale for heatmap's radius

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the heatmap's radius.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsFeature &feature, QgsRenderContext &context, int layer=-1, bool selected=false, bool drawVertexMarker=false) override
memberdef.name: renderFeature

briefdescription.para: Render a feature using this renderer in the given context.

detaileddescription.para: Must be called between startRender() and stopRender() calls. Default implementation renders a symbol as determined by symbolForFeature() call. Returns true if the feature has been returned (this is used for example to determine whether the feature may be labelled).
If layer is not -1, the renderer should draw only a particula layer from symbols (in order to support symbol level rendering).

briefdescription.para: Returns the render quality used for drawing the heatmap.

simplesect.para: render quality. A value of 1 indicates maximum quality, and increasing the value will result in faster drawing but lower quality rendering.

briefdescription.para: store renderer info to XML element
Sets the color ramp to use for shading the heatmap.

parameterdescription.para: color ramp for heatmap. Ownership of ramp is transferred to the renderer.

briefdescription.para: Sets the maximum value used for shading the heatmap.

parameterdescription.para: maximum value for heatmap shading. Set to 0 for automatic calculation of maximum value.

briefdescription.para: Sets the radius for the heatmap.
Sets the map unit scale used for the heatmap's radius.

parameterdescription.para: map unit scale for heatmap's radius

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the heatmap's radius.
Sets the render quality used for drawing the heatmap.

parameterdescription.para: render quality. A value of 1 indicates maximum quality, and increasing the value will result in faster drawing but lower quality rendering.

briefdescription.para: Sets the expression used for weighting points when generating the heatmap.

parameterdescription.para: point weight expression. If set to empty, all points are equally weighted.

briefdescription.para: Must be called when a new render cycle is started.

detaileddescription.para: A call to startRender() must always be followed by a corresponding call to stopRender() after all features have been rendered.

parameterdescription.para: Additional information passed to the renderer about the job which will be rendered

simplesect.para: This method is not thread safe. Before calling startRender() in a non-main thread, the renderer should instead be cloned and startRender()/stopRender() called on the clone.

briefdescription.para: Must be called when a render cycle has finished, to allow the renderer to clean up.

detaileddescription.para: Calls to stopRender() must always be preceded by a call to startRender().

simplesect.para: This method is not thread safe. Before calling startRender() in a non-main thread, the renderer should instead be cloned and startRender()/stopRender() called on the clone.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of attributes required by this renderer.

detaileddescription.para: Attributes not listed in here may not have been requested from the provider at rendering time.

briefdescription.para: Returns the expression used for weighting points when generating the heatmap.

simplesect.para: point weight expression. If empty, all points are equally weighted.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new heatmap renderer instance from XML.
A renderer which draws points as a live heatmap.
